channel.title: [PI] WildernessReLoaded V2
channel.description:
In this version Dragon claws special dont work, becose i had to chose full pvp curses or d claw spec so... Also home have specific teleport bug, as you know wildernessreloaded v2 home is it wilderness i made it safe zone but same times it sais u cant teleport above 30 wilderness idk how to fix i tried but failed. Also it's prob my last pi server ever i was working on it. I was self hosting it for a WEEK stopped alch dupe no more slayer task or quests bug etc. It was perfect made for hosting no more small misstakes. Enjoy Client: http://uppit.com/feakyrqn1sy0/Client.rar Server: http://uppit.com/8vtgopimck8o/WildernessReLoaded.rar -------------Features------------ •Near-reality custom items •Godwars maps, all bosses KC interface... •Pvp items (vesta,statius,claws,etc •Chaotic melee weapons & arcane stream neck + staff of light •All skills working •PVp falador + safe zones •curse prayers •Donator zone •all metal dragons,kq •Spirit shield's whu give invisable str bonus •caskets with reward •Slayer task with slayer points reward&shop •3 Simple quests with q point cape if u complete all quests u can buy it in animal magnetism quest shop. •and loots more just cant remember lol download and find out you self. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QLWCn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qnfrF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DC8Dl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RYUS4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BaPN0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f9C30.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3dnxX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KXlj8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1GCm5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vTInj.png[/img] more pictures you can find here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494813.0.html Well it falador pvp you dont losse items and u dont get anythink but, if u have 5m coins u will get pvp drop from kill but u gonna losse money :)P [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hax3w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iQEZm.png[/img] To change background:
http://uppit.com/k6ougaupn9tz/Suite.rar this is link for suite dump all models from tittle.jag jagex archives open dat files with pain also dont worgot u cant inport background in png,gif or any other image format u need to make a background.dat file else you get messed up background

Ty

imsuperman05:

Looks like alot of work, but the graphics look like complete shit.

Well ty

OmgItsShane:

I think the wildy home is pretty stupid in my opinion. Otherwise its good.

I created wildy home bcose server name lol WildernessReLoaded so it should be close to wildy

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:9, topic:407458”][quote author=OmgItsShane link=topic=508744.msg3691091#msg3691091 date=1312133311]
I think the wildy home is pretty stupid in my opinion. Otherwise its good.
[/quote]I like it, makes it look original.

Looks pretty good. Goodluck on V3.

Looks like alot of work, but the graphics look like complete shit.
[/quote]317 graphics… ?[/quote]
V3 prob gonna be a new server without ancients pray or any custom weapons godswords only, and maby statius, vestas arrmours =/[quote=“imsuperman05, post:10, topic:407458”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=508744.msg3691110#msg3691110 date=1312134096]

It does not even look like 317 graphics or PI the PvP sign looks like shit, the hitmarks looks horrible, and some of the items too. Looks like Delta.[/quote]
Maby idk, also you can change hitmarks and hp bar to old one its client with option like other pi has

I kind of like v1 better haha but I do like the home idea. archived.

ty but v2 is better no more simple bugs or unfixes like i released v1 and forgot what i was about to do quest 4 and 5 and inmisstake fucked quests and yeah i forgot to fix em
